    Name Type Required Description
    anonymous EventAction false No description

    and

    Name Type Required Description
    anonymous object false No description
    » value string true Value of memo

    EventWatchAction

    {
  "actionType": "string",
  "watchType": "TSYS_ALERTS",
  "code": "string",
  "reason": "string",
  "days": 0,
  "description": "string"
}

    Properties

    allOf - discriminator: EventAction.actionType

    Name Type Required Description
    anonymous EventAction false No description

    and

    Name Type Required Description
    anonymous object false No description
    » watchType string true The watch type
    » code string false The watch code
    » reason string false The watch reason
    » days integer false The watch life-span (in days)
    » description string false A meaningful description, for this watch

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    watchType TSYS_ALERTS
    watchType SECURITY
    watchType CARD
    watchType TIER

    Sender

    {
  "id": "string",
  "channel": "SMS",
  "value": "string",
  "countryCode": "str",
  "component": "string",
  "brand": "string"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string false The unique reference, for this Sender entry
    channel string false The message channel, that this Sender can be used for
    value string true The 'from' address value
    countryCode string false The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code, that this SenderId can be used for
    component string false The component, that this Sender can be used for
    brand string false The client brand name

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    channel SMS
    channel EMAIL

    PublicHoliday

    {
  "id": "string",
  "component": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "channel": "SMS",
  "date": "2018-04-05"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string false The unique reference, for this PublicHoliday entry
    component string false The component, that this PublicHoliday applies to
    description string true A meaningful description of this PublicHoliday
    channel string false The message channel, that this PublicHoliday applies to
    date string(date) true The calendar date, of this PublicHoliday (full-date - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    channel SMS
    channel EMAIL

    SendingWindow

    {
  "id": "string",
  "component": "string",
  "channel": "SMS",
  "start": "string",
  "end": "string",
  "day": 1,
  "allowed": true
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string false The unique reference, for this SendingWindow entry
    component string false The component, that this SendingWindow applies to
    channel string false The message channel, that this SendingWindow applies to
    start string true The window start time (time-hour ":" time-minute - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    end string true The window end time (time-hour ":" time-minute - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    day integer true The calendar day (Sunday=1, Monday=2, Tuesday=3, Wednesday=4, Thursday=5, Friday=6, Saturday=7)
    allowed boolean true Is sending permitted, at all, on this day (i.e. if set to false, then the SendingWindow for the entire day is closed)

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    channel SMS
    channel EMAIL

    Wallet

    {
  "id": "string",
  "sequence": 0,
  "name": "string",
  "accountNumber": "string",
  "expiryDate": "string",
  "sortCode": "string",
  "nameOnCard": "string",
  "securityCode": "string",
  "type": "CREDIT_CARD",
  "status": "PRE_VALIDATION",
  "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "pspReference": "string"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string true The unique reference, for this entry
    sequence integer true The payment source order, for the customer (lower value means higher priority)
    name string true A memorable name, for this wallet entry
    accountNumber string true The payment source account number
    expiryDate string false The [CREDIT_CARD, DEBIT_CARD] expiry date (M/yy, MM/yy or MM/yyyy)
    sortCode string false For [DIRECT_DEBIT, ACH_CHECKING_ACCOUNT, ACH_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT] types
    nameOnCard string false The printed name, on the payment card
    securityCode string false The CVV security code. This field will only contain a value when adding a new card.
    type string true The payment source type
    status string false The status, of this wallet entry
    whenLogged string(date-time) false The date this payment source was added
    pspReference string false A PSP tokenised reference, for this payment source

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    type CREDIT_CARD
    type DEBIT_CARD
    type DIRECT_DEBIT
    type ACH_CHECKING_ACCOUNT
    type ACH_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT
    status PRE_VALIDATION
    status VALIDATION_FAILED
    status ACTIVE
    status DEACTIVATED

    User

    {
  "name": "string",
  "email": "string",
  "password": "string",
  "groups": [
    "string"
  ],
  "roles": [
    {
      "role": {
        "alias": "string",
        "name": "string",
        "description": "string",
        "enabled": true
      },
      "permissions": [
        {
          "name": "READ",
          "whenUpdated": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "accountLocked": true,
  "passwordLastUpdated": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "requirePasswordChange": true,
  "lastLogin": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    name string true The unique reference, for this User entry
    email string false Email Id of the user
    password string false Password of the user
    groups [string] false A list of all groups for the user
    roles [UserRolePermission] false A list of all actions for the user group
    accountLocked boolean false Is user account locked?
    passwordLastUpdated string(date-time) false User last password updated date (date-time - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    requirePasswordChange boolean false Is password change required?
    lastLogin string(date-time) false User last login date (date-time - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)

    UserGroup

    {
  "name": "string",
  "roles": [
    {
      "role": {
        "alias": "string",
        "name": "string",
        "description": "string",
        "enabled": true
      },
      "permissions": [
        {
          "name": "READ",
          "whenUpdated": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    name string true Name of the UserGroup entry
    roles [UserRolePermission] false A list of all actions for the user group

    UserRolePermission

    {
  "role": {
    "alias": "string",
    "name": "string",
    "description": "string",
    "enabled": true
  },
  "permissions": [
    {
      "name": "READ",
      "whenUpdated": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
    }
  ]
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    role Role true No description
    permissions [Permission] false A list of all permissions associated to a role

    Role

    {
  "alias": "string",
  "name": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "enabled": true
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    alias string false A display-friendly name, for this role
    name string true The unique reference, for this role entry
    description string false A meaningful description of this user group action
    enabled boolean false Is this action enabled?

    Permission

    {
  "name": "READ",
  "whenUpdated": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    name string true User role permission
    whenUpdated string(date-time) false When permission updated date (date-time - http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    name READ
    name CREATE
    name UPDATE
    name DELETE
    name EXECUTE

    KeywordIntent

  "type": "string",
  "description": "string",

    {
      "name": "string",

      "pattern": "string",
      "description": "string"
    }
  ]
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    type string true The type of the Keyword
    description string false A meaningful description of this keyword intent
    keywords [Keyword] false A list of all keywords for this type

  "name": "string",
  "priority": 0,
  "pattern": "string",
  "description": "string"
}

    Properties

    name string true The unique reference, for this Keyword entry
    priority integer true The priority of the Keyword
    pattern string true The regular expression pattern
    description string false A meaningful description of this keyword entry

    UnsubscribedContact

    {
  "id": "string",
  "recipient": "string",
  "channelType": "string",
  "component": "string",
  "alertType": "string",
  "reason": "string",
  "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string false The primary key
    recipient string true The recipient's contact address to unsubscribe
    channelType string true The delivery channel, that this contact recipient uses
    component string true The platform component, being unsubscribed from
    alertType string false The specific alert, being unsubscribed from
    reason string true The reason for unsubscribing
    whenLogged string(date-time) false The date this recipient was added

    IeForm

    {
  "id": "string",
  "status": "NEW",
  "totalIncome": 0,
  "totalExpenditure": 0,
  "updatedBySavingCalc": "CUSTOMER",
  "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "whenCompleted": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "answers": [
    {
      "value": "string",
      "notes": "string",
      "period": "WEEKLY",
      "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
      "questionName": "string",
      "questionDescription": "string",
      "questionGroup": {
        "name": "string",
        "sequence": 0,
        "whenLogged": "string",
        "parent": null
      }
    }
  ]
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    id string false The unique reference, for this entry
    status string false The status of this I&E form
    totalIncome number(double) false The calculated total customer income amount
    totalExpenditure number(double) false The calculated total customer expenditure amount
    updatedBySavingCalc string false An optional flag that indicates the basis for the calculation
    whenLogged string(date-time) false The date-time this form was created (date-time, http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    whenCompleted string(date-time) false The date-time this form was completed (date-time, http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    answers [IeAnswer] false The list of customer supplied I&E information

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    status NEW
    status IN_PROGRESS
    status COMPLETE
    status CANCELLED
    status TIMEOUT
    updatedBySavingCalc CUSTOMER
    updatedBySavingCalc OPTOUT
    updatedBySavingCalc CALCULATED

    IeAnswer

    {
  "value": "string",
  "notes": "string",
  "period": "WEEKLY",
  "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "questionName": "string",
  "questionDescription": "string",
  "questionGroup": {
    "name": "string",
    "sequence": 0,
    "whenLogged": "string",
    "parent": null
  }
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    value string true The actual answer value
    notes string false Customer supplied additional information
    period string false Customer indication of a regulary re-occuring I&E line-item
    whenLogged string(date-time) false The date-time this answer was submitted (date-time, http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    questionName string true The name of the I&E question, being answered
    questionDescription string false A short description, of the I&E question, being answered
    questionGroup IeGroup false No description

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    period WEEKLY
    period MONTHLY
    period QUARTERLY
    period ANNUALLY
    period BIWEEKLY
    period HALFYEAR
    period FOURWEEKLY

    IeGroup

    {
  "name": "string",
  "sequence": 0,
  "whenLogged": "string",
  "parent": null
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    name string true The unique name of this I&E question group
    sequence integer false The index order of this group of I&E questions
    whenLogged string false When this I&E question group was added (date-time, http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    parent IeGroup false No description

    IeQuestion

    {
  "name": "string",
  "group": {
    "name": "string",
    "sequence": 0,
    "whenLogged": "string",
    "parent": null
  },
  "questionType": "string",
  "inputType": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "whenLogged": "2018-04-05T02:49:35Z",
  "highPriority": true,
  "periodFieldDefault": "WEEKLY",
  "notesFieldOption": "NONE",
  "minValue": 0,
  "maxValue": 0,
  "decimalPlaces": 0,
  "readOnly": true,
  "triggerFiguresRule": "string",
  "triggerFigurePrimary": true,
  "excludeRecommendedSavings": true
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    name string true The name of this I&E question
    group IeGroup true No description
    questionType string true The type classification of this I&E question
    inputType string true The expected data-type, when answering this I&E question
    description string false A short description, of this I&E question
    whenLogged string(date-time) false The date-time this question was created (date-time, http://xml2rfc.ietf.org/public/rfc/html/rfc3339.html#anchor14)
    highPriority boolean false Is this I&E question a high-priority line-item?
    periodFieldDefault string false The default period value, to display when presenting this I&E question to a customer
    notesFieldOption string false Display options for the I&E answer additional notes field
    minValue number(double) false For numeric I&E answer values, the minmum amount to accept
    maxValue number(double) false For numeric I&E answer values, the minmum amount to accept
    decimalPlaces number(integer) false Number of decimal places in I&E answer value
    readOnly boolean false A flag to indicate that the customer should not be able to update their answer, to this I&E question
    triggerFiguresRule string false Category of trigger figures rules, to apply to I&E answers
    triggerFigurePrimary boolean false A flag to indicate that this is the most important I&E question, within the specified triggerFiguresRule category
    excludeRecommendedSavings boolean false Should this question be excluded, when calculating the customers recommended savings

    Enumerated Values

    Property Value
    periodFieldDefault WEEKLY
    periodFieldDefault MONTHLY
    periodFieldDefault QUARTERLY
    periodFieldDefault ANNUALLY
    periodFieldDefault BIWEEKLY
    periodFieldDefault HALFYEAR
    periodFieldDefault FOURWEEKLY
    notesFieldOption NONE
    notesFieldOption OPTIONAL
    notesFieldOption MANDATORY

    AuthenticationRequest

    {
  "username": "string",
  "password": "string"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    username string true The unique user name
    password string true The password of the user

    SimSwapResult

    {
  "transaction_id": "string",
  "risk_result": "string",
  "account_id": "string",
  "campaign_id": "string",
  "msisdn": "string",
  "aspect_response_id": "string",
  "type_id": "string"
}

    Properties

    Name Type Required Description
    transaction_id string true The unique reference, for the initial SimSwap request
    risk_result string true The result status
    account_id string false The host system account id
    campaign_id string false The campaign id
    msisdn string false The mobile number, being checked
    aspect_response_id string false The Aspect unique transaction id
    type_id string false The type of check, being performed
    Shell HTTP JavaScript Node.JS Ruby Python Java Go
